item.title: When You Call My Equinox I See Purple
item.description:
With the new Sony Ericsson Equinox Carbon cell phone for T-Mobile, you’ll know who’s calling just by its color. This phone goes beyond Caller ID with its pulsating caller colors. No need to anxiously stare at your phone waiting for a call â€“ just set it down and discreetly watch for your personalized color. You can assign five different colors, like purple, amber, or sapphire, to specific contacts. This way, you can easily see who’s calling with a quick glance, or even pretend you didn’t notice that unwanted call...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/when-you-call-my-equinox-i-see-purple/
